page.title: 06FRENCH CASINO IN LANCASHIRE
page.content: {THE CASTLE CASINO NIGHT CLUB} The Castle Casino is situated on North Shore Promenade. It contains a room with tables for private card games, slot machines , a restaurant and two bars. It was built around 1920 in the architectural style of a French chateau, for a wealthy eccentric, who intended it for his girlfriend who was in show business. However she never lived there. In 1965 the wrestler Jack Pye bought it and turned it into a night-club. Now it is owned by Monsieur Brivet and is part of a French Consortium which owns casinos in Blackpool, Manchester, Lyons and California. Local people, as well as holidaymakers, enjoy the chance to win some money and have a good night out.
